name: Bounce Back (skiwee45)
description:
Jam game for Wowie Jam 3.0

In this game you play as a diamond while a ball ricochets off walls, and each time it hits anything you gain a point. However, everytime it hits you, you will be prompted with three choices: adding another ball, increasing the speed of the ball(s), or placing a wall block randomly in the arena. These upgrades allow you to score higher, but be careful, you have a limited amount of lives and the balls can shoot you!

Time limit of 1 minute per match.

Have fun!

Update: Mac now supported and fixed bug where UI was not on screen.
